statements: SELECT report_id, report_date, quality_score, manager_id FROM QualityControlData;
SELECT report_date, quality_score, report_id, manager_id FROM QualityControlData;
SELECT quality_score, report_date, manager_id, report_id FROM QualityControlData;
SELECT manager_id, report_id, quality_score, report_date FROM QualityControlData;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlData;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlData WHERE quality_score > 80;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM QualityControlData WHERE manager_id = 5 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(quality_score) AS avg_score, manager_id FROM QualityControlData GROUP BY manager_id;
SELECT report_id, report_date, quality_score FROM QualityControlData WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT report_id, quality_score FROM QualityControlData ORDER BY quality_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Managers WHERE manager_id = 1;
SELECT manager_name, department_id FROM Managers WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT manager_id, manager_name, department_id FROM Managers WHERE department_id IN (3, 4) ORDER BY manager_name DESC;
SELECT manager_name FROM Managers WHERE department_id = 5 AND manager_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT DISTINCT department_id FROM Managers ORDER BY department_id ASC;
SELECT manager_name, department_id FROM Managers WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY manager_name DESC
SELECT manager_name, department_id FROM Managers WHERE department_id = 2 ORDER BY manager_name ASC
SELECT manager_name, department_id FROM Managers WHERE department_id = 3 ORDER BY manager_name DESC, manager_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Managers WHERE department_id = 2 AND manager_id > 100 ORDER BY manager_id ASC
SELECT manager_name, department_id FROM Managers WHERE department_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY department_id ASC, manager_name DESC
SELECT * FROM managers WHERE manager_id = 1;
SELECT name, department FROM managers WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT report_date, report_data FROM reports WHERE manager_id = 5;
SELECT qc_result, qc_timestamp FROM quality_control WHERE qc_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM managers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM managers WHERE manager_id = 1
SELECT manager_id, name, department FROM managers ORDER BY department DESC
SELECT qc_timestamp, qc_result FROM quality_control WHERE qc_id = 3
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_data FROM reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM reports JOIN managers ON reports.manager_id = managers.manager_id
SELECT * FROM Managers;
SELECT manager_name, department FROM Managers ORDER BY manager_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE manager_id = 1;
SELECT report_name FROM Reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT qc_id, product_name, inspection_date FROM QualityControl WHERE result = 'pass';
SELECT * FROM Managers WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT manager_name, hire_date FROM Managers WHERE manager_id > 3 ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT Managers.manager_name, Reports.report_name, Reports.report_date FROM Managers JOIN Reports ON Managers.manager_id = Reports.manager_id WHERE Reports.report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_name, inspection_date FROM Trends JOIN QualityControl ON Trends.qc_id = QualityControl.qc_id WHERE QualityControl.result = 'Pass';
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(manager_name)) AS avg_length FROM Managers;
SELECT * FROM manager_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM manager_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM patterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%analysis%';
SELECT manager_name, manager_department FROM managers WHERE manager_department = 'Finance';
SELECT trend_date, trend_description FROM trends ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM managers WHERE manager_department = 'Sales' ORDER BY manager_name DESC;
SELECT manager_name, manager_department FROM managers WHERE manager_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM patterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%A%' AND pattern_description LIKE '%pattern%';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM manager_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-28';
SELECT trend_description, trend_date FROM trends WHERE trend_date > '2021-06-30' ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
